TEXT.TITLE: FHLBB CHANGES SHORT-TERM DISCOUNT NOTE RATES
TEXT.BODY:
The Federal Home Loan Bank Board adjusted the rates on its short-term discount notes as follows: MATURITY NEW RATE OLD RATE MATURITY 30-174 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 30-174 days 175-190 days 5.88 pct 5.85 pct 175-190 days 191-270 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 191-270 days 271-288 days 5.92 pct 5.92 pct 271-288 days 289-360 days 5.00 pct 5.00 pct 289-360 days
Reuter
